text:
The samples which come with Batik 1.0 are unviewable on my machine (Apple Firewire Powerbook, Mac OS X 10.04).  It appears that the scan lines to not match up with the display width.  By modifying the window width, I can make the image appear more or less sheared, but I cannot get rid of the artifacts entirely.  Under most circumstances, the shearing is bad enough that the image is unintelligible.  I have tested with GVT.svg, anne.svg, batik3D.svg, chessboard.svg, and gradients.svg.

I can provide screen shots on request.

Mac OS X reports:

java version "1.3.0"
Java(TM) 2 Runtime Environment, Standard Edition (build 1.3)
Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (build 1.3.0, mixed mode)
creator: david@leppik.net
